Symptom: Do you ever feel like asking for help will just make things worse?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like reaching out might lead to judgment, misunderstanding, or being a burden?

Symptom: Do you sometimes forget how to talk about your own feelings?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like the words vanish, or you’re afraid they’ll come out wrong?

Symptom: Do you ever feel like you’re stuck in loops — not just in thought, but in your life?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like no matter what you do, you keep ending up in the same emotional patterns?

Symptom: Do you feel like you've built a version of yourself just to survive?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like who you are isn’t fully real — just what got you through?

Symptom: Do you ever feel grief for something you can’t name — like a version of life that never happened?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like mourning a life path you never got to walk?

Symptom: Do you get emotionally numb around people — even the ones you love?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like your feelings flatten when you're expected to connect?

Symptom: Do you ever feel like you’re surviving instead of living?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like you’re doing what it takes to get through, not to grow?

Symptom: Do you feel like no one would understand if you told the truth about how bad it gets?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like your pain feels unspeakable — or too big to share?

Symptom: Do you sometimes wish you could just turn your mind off — even just for an hour?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like your thoughts are a noise machine you can't unplug?

Symptom: Do you feel like your nervous system is always waiting for the next bad thing?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like you're bracing for impact, even when nothing is wrong yet?
